actionCalls.name: ActionSendGECaseAutoresponseEmail_SPM
actionCalls.label: Send GE Case Autoresponse Email - SPM

value.stringValue:
Thank you for contacting us.  We will review the information that you have provided and one of our team will contact you within two working days to discuss your enquiry.

Get in touch. 
Should you need to contact us in the meantime, please reply to this email or call us quoting your case reference number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Call: 0330 1010 444
Our office hours are Monday - Friday, 8.30am - 4.45pm.

General Enquiries Online Form 

Did you know you can submit most enquiries vis our intuitive Online Form?  You can access the form here https://www.spenergynetworks.co.uk/pages/general_enquiries.aspx

Need more information? 
Our website contains useful information guidance leaflets can be found on our website at www.spenergynetworks.co.uk 

To report a power cut or damage to electricity power lines or substations call the national Freephone number 105.

­

Information on SP Energy Networks Data Privacy Policy can be found by using the following link
https://www.spenergynetworks.co.uk/pages/privacy.aspx

actionCalls.label: Pace Meeting Auto Response Email Alert

value.stringValue: Thank you for contacting SP Energy Networks - {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Thank you for taking the time to contact SP Energy Networks. Your case reference number is {!$Record.CaseNumber}.

We will investigate your concerns and you will receive further contact within 10 working days.

In the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us on 0330 1010 109 Monday- Friday 08:30-16:45.

Further information on our Complaints Handling Procedure can be found here

Regards


Customer Contact Team
SP Energy Networks
3rd Floor 320 St Vincent Crescent
Glasgow
G2 5AD
Spencomplaintsnorth@spenergynetworks.co.uk

Information on SP Energy Networks Data Privacy Policy can be found by using the following link:
https://www.spenergynetworks.co.uk/pages/privacy.aspx
